Summary: 2 lights changing from red,to blue, to white 500-1,000' up in the sky.
divs: sighting detailsthis case was reported to pete hartinger rufos roundtown ufo society in circleville,oh. i do their field investigations for them to relate to mufon.ssd\fi connie mcnichols as reported to rufos. we saw 2 lights changing from red, to blue, to white in the sky approximately 500-1,000' in the sky. it was moving in erratic patterns like a kite would.this happened on september 4th 2009 around 11:00pm in liberty township, just north of west chester ohio which is a suburb north of cincinnati.i was driving down yankee rd.turning to milliken rd.so we (my wife and 14 year old daughter)watched it for 15-30 seconds as we approached the intersection.no one could explain or identify what we were looking at so i classify it as a ufo. it was weird enough that everyone was quiet until we got home and i wanted to go back and see it again and my wife was scared and told me not to.crazy stuff.wondering if anyone else reported seeing the same thing.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There was one other sighting in Cincinnati on or around September 4th 2009
